title: Build SEO-optimized marketing website for Online Tax Consultant with services, CTAs, testimonials, FAQ, blog, and WhatsApp contact

requirements.text: Create a clean, modern, corporate visual theme for the “Online Tax Consultant” website using blue and white as primary colors with subtle green accents; apply the theme consistently across typography, spacing, layout, and component styles for a trustworthy financial-services look.

quotes: The design should use blue, white, and subtle green colors to represent trust and financial growth.
The website should look clean, corporate, and easy to navigate.

acceptanceCriteria: All main pages share a consistent header, footer, typography scale, and spacing system.
Primary and accent colors reflect blue/white with subtle green highlights (buttons, badges, icons, or section accents).
UI is responsive and readable on mobile, tablet, and desktop.

requirements.text: Implement site-wide navigation and routing for these pages: Home, Services (overview), individual Service detail pages (7 services), Pricing, Testimonials, Blog, Contact, Privacy Policy, and Terms & Conditions.

quotes: Add testimonial section, FAQ section, service pages, and contact form with WhatsApp integration.
✅ EXTRA PAGES YOU CAN ADD * Blog ... * Pricing Page * Testimonials * Contact Page * Privacy Policy * Terms & Conditions

acceptanceCriteria: Top navigation provides clear links to Home, Services, Pricing, Blog, Testimonials, and Contact.
Footer includes links to Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions.
Each page renders with a clear H1 and supporting sections.

requirements.text: Build the Home page using the provided SEO-optimized content, including: the exact H1 “Online Tax Consultant – Trusted Tax Filing & GST Experts in India”, the provided intro paragraph, and a prominent CTA area that includes the three bullet CTAs (File ITR in Minutes, Get GST Registration in 3 Days, Free Tax Consultation Available).

quotes:
### H1:

Online Tax Consultant – Trusted Tax Filing & GST Experts in India

### Intro Paragraph:

Welcome to **Online Tax Consultant** ...

### CTA:

✔ File Your ITR in Minutes
✔ Get GST Registration in 3 Days
✔ Free Tax Consultation Available

acceptanceCriteria: Home page H1 matches the provided text exactly.
Home page includes the provided intro paragraph content in readable, keyword-rich copy.
Home page displays a prominent CTA block above the fold (or near top) containing all three CTA bullets.

requirements.text: Add strong, persistent call-to-action buttons across the site (at minimum in hero/header and at relevant sections): “Book Free Consultation”, “File Your ITR Now”, and “Talk to Tax Expert”, each linking to the Contact page and/or opening the WhatsApp flow (as applicable).

quotes: Include strong call-to-action buttons like “Book Free Consultation”, “File Your ITR Now”, and “Talk to Tax Expert”.
...contact form with WhatsApp integration.

acceptanceCriteria: All three CTAs appear on the Home page and at least one other page (e.g., Services overview).
CTA buttons are visually prominent and consistent with the design theme.
At least one CTA triggers WhatsApp contact (via a wa.me link) with a prefilled message including “Online Tax Consultant”.

requirements.text: Create a Services overview page listing all 7 services with short summaries, key benefits, and internal links to dedicated service detail pages; include the provided SEO keywords and the provided service-specific content for each service detail page.

quotes: # ✅ SERVICES YOU CAN INCLUDE
Keywords: ITR filing online, income tax return filing India, file ITR online, tax filing consultant
We provide hassle-free and accurate ITR filing services...
Keywords: GST registration online...
...and the remaining 5 services with their keywords/content

acceptanceCriteria: Services overview page lists exactly these services: ITR Filing; GST Registration & Filing; Business Registration Services; Tax Planning & Advisory; TDS Return Filing; Accounting & Bookkeeping; Notice & Compliance Handling.
Each service detail page includes the provided service content text and prominently displays the provided keywords (naturally in headings/paragraphs, not as a spammy list).
Each service detail page includes at least one CTA button leading to Contact/WhatsApp.

requirements.text: Add an About/Why Choose Us section using the provided About Us text, the provided target keywords, and the “Why Choose Us” bullet list; place it on the Home page and/or as part of a dedicated About section within the Home page.

quotes: # ✅ ABOUT US SECTION
Online Tax Consultant is a team of experienced tax professionals...

Keywords:
tax consultant India, online tax advisor, professional tax services

# ✅ WHY CHOOSE US

* 100% Secure & Confidential
* Expert Chartered Accountants
* Affordable Pricing
* Fast Turnaround Time
* Dedicated Support

acceptanceCriteria: About content is present and readable, not placeholder text.
Why Choose Us displays all five provided bullet points.
Section includes at least one CTA leading to Contact/WhatsApp.

requirements.text: Create a Testimonials section (and dedicated Testimonials page) featuring multiple testimonials relevant to Indian individuals and small businesses; ensure the section is professionally styled and includes a CTA.

quotes: Add testimonial section...
* Testimonials

acceptanceCriteria: Home page includes a testimonials section with at least 4 testimonials.
Testimonials page lists the same or more testimonials with consistent styling.
Each testimonial includes at least a name (or initials), customer type (e.g., salaried, freelancer, small business), and a short quote.

requirements.text: Create an FAQ section using the 5 provided FAQ questions and supply clear, professional answers tailored to the services offered; place the FAQ section on the Home page and optionally on Services/Contact pages as well.

quotes:
# ✅ FAQ SECTION

1. How can I file ITR online?
2. What documents are required for GST registration?
3. Is online tax filing safe?
4. How long does company registration take?
5. Can you handle income tax notices?

acceptanceCriteria: FAQ section includes exactly the five provided questions in the same wording.
Each question has a visible answer (e.g., accordion) written in clear English.
FAQ section is accessible (keyboard navigable, clear focus states).

requirements.text: Implement a Contact page with a contact form (name, email/phone, service interested in, message) and WhatsApp integration via a WhatsApp click-to-chat link; submitting the form must show a success/failure state in the UI.

quotes: ...contact form with WhatsApp integration.

acceptanceCriteria: Contact page displays a form with at least: full name, phone or email, service selection, and message.
WhatsApp button/link opens WhatsApp click-to-chat (wa.me) with a prefilled message that includes the selected service when available.
Form submission provides user feedback (loading, success, error).

requirements.text: Add backend support to store contact form submissions (“leads”) in the single Motoko actor, including creating a lead record with timestamp and returning an acknowledgement; expose query methods to list leads for admin/debug purposes (no public admin UI required).

quotes: ...contact form...

acceptanceCriteria: Lead submission is persisted in the canister across refreshes (stable storage as needed).
A backend method exists to create a lead and returns a success response to the frontend.
A backend query method exists to list leads (for testing), and it does not crash on empty data.

requirements.text: Implement SEO basics across the site: set the provided Meta Title, Meta Description, and Meta Keywords; ensure each page has a clear H1 and appropriate H2 section headings; ensure service pages contain keyword-rich content matching the provided keyword sets.

quotes: Website should be SEO optimized with proper headings (H1, H2), meta tags, and keyword-rich content.

# ✅ META TAGS

Meta Title ...
Meta Description ...
Meta Keywords ...

acceptanceCriteria: The HTML document includes the provided meta title/description/keywords (site-wide baseline).
Each page renders exactly one primary H1 and uses H2s for major sections.
Service pages contain the provided keyword themes in natural prose.

requirements.text: Create a Blog page with a list of at least 6 starter posts (Tax Saving Tips, ITR Updates, GST Rules themes) and individual blog post pages with readable formatting; content can be static (no CMS required).

quotes: * Blog (Tax Saving Tips, ITR Updates, GST Rules)

acceptanceCriteria: Blog page lists at least 6 posts with title, date (or “Updated”), and excerpt.
Clicking a post opens a dedicated blog post page.
Blog pages include proper headings and internal links back to Services/Contact.

requirements.text: Create a Pricing page with clear, professional pricing tiers for at least: ITR filing, GST filing, and Business registration; include disclaimers that final pricing may vary by complexity and a CTA to contact/WhatsApp for a quote.

quotes: * Pricing Page

acceptanceCriteria: Pricing page displays at least 3 pricing cards/tiers with included items.
Pricing page includes a brief disclaimer about variability by complexity.
Pricing page includes at least one prominent CTA to Contact/WhatsApp.

requirements.text: Add Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions pages with professional, generic content suitable for an Indian online tax consultancy website (no external integrations implied) and include these links in the site footer.

quotes: * Privacy Policy
* Terms & Conditions

acceptanceCriteria: Privacy Policy page is accessible from the footer and renders readable sectioned text.
Terms & Conditions page is accessible from the footer and renders readable sectioned text.
No references are made to unsupported integrations (e.g., email providers, third-party auth).

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (all logic in backend/main.mo); add a migration file only if stable state upgrades are required.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui; compose those UI components from outside that directory if needed.
Do not modify any frontend paths marked immutable by the system context (e.g., useInternetIdentity/useActor/main.tsx); implement app features in new or editable files instead.
No third-party authentication other than Internet Identity (not required for this marketing site).
No external email/SMS providers; contact form handling must be on-canister storage + WhatsApp click-to-chat link for direct messaging.
nonGoals: Implementing payments or checkout for pricing.
Implementing a full CMS with admin authoring UI for blog posts.
Integrating external CRM, email marketing tools, or analytics platforms.

required: Minimal corporate logo mark with wordmark “Online Tax Consultant” in blue/white with subtle green accent (otc-logo.dim_512x256.png)
Clean abstract finance-themed hero background with subtle geometric shapes in blue/white/green (hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
Set of 7 simple outline-style service icons consistent in stroke and color accents (service-icons-sprite.dim_1024x1024.png)
